```css
// Property: maxZoomScale
// Description: Maximum scaling factor of the scrollable region and its content.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.ScrollView
'.max-zoom-scale-0': { maxZoomScale: 0 }
'.max-zoom-scale-1': { maxZoomScale: 0.01 }
'.max-zoom-scale-5': { maxZoomScale: 0.05 }
'.max-zoom-scale-10': { maxZoomScale: 0.10 }
'.max-zoom-scale-25': { maxZoomScale: 0.25 }
'.max-zoom-scale-50': { maxZoomScale: 0.5 }
'.max-zoom-scale-75': { maxZoomScale: 0.75 }
'.max-zoom-scale-90': { maxZoomScale: 0.9 }
'.max-zoom-scale-95': { maxZoomScale: 0.95 }
'.max-zoom-scale-100': { maxZoomScale: 1 }
'.max-zoom-scale-105': { maxZoomScale: 1.05 }
'.max-zoom-scale-110': { maxZoomScale: 1.1 }
'.max-zoom-scale-125': { maxZoomScale: 1.25 }
'.max-zoom-scale-150': { maxZoomScale: 1.5 }
'.max-zoom-scale-200': { maxZoomScale: 2 }
```
